name: CyberPunk Mario (2-Week Prototype)
description:
Our storyline is a take on Super Mario Bros, except Mario, as a robot, is running through a cyberpunk, dystopian city.

He has to collect electricity to charge up (which gives him more time) and reach the final goal. 

His challenges include robotic enemies that stop him from getting his way and also falling off the buildings. The glowing emission indicates platforms and rooftops he can jump on.

A two-week-long project for a prototyping assignment by Eoin, Marcus, Sonali
